content.raw: Are these values directly from the accelerometer or are you calculating them? Some of the major outliers you’re pointing out could be impulse responses to collisions \(i.e. instanteous 7G from changing ground planes without suspension is certainly possible with the right speed\). Is this related to an issue you’re having?
